idea-plugin.name: Base16 lime
idea-plugin.vendor: limelier, Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 lime for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by limelier. Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
